ios.example.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace example-app/ios/exampleapp.xcworkspace -configuration Debug -scheme exampleapp -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone SE (3rd generation)' -derivedDataPath example-app/ios/build

ios.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace dev-app/ios/StripeTerminalReactNativeDevApp.xcworkspace -configuration Debug -scheme StripeTerminalReactNativeDevApp -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone SE (3rd generation)' -derivedDataPath dev-app/ios/build

ios.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace dev-app/ios/StripeTerminalReactNativeDevApp.xcworkspace -configuration Release -scheme StripeTerminalReactNativeDevApp -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone SE (3rd generation)' -derivedDataPath dev-app/ios/build

android.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && (cd dev-app/android; ./gradlew assembleRelease assembleAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=release ; cd -)
